props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: decorative
props.description:
Whether or not the component is purely decorative.
When `true`, accessibility-related attributes are updated so that that the rendered element is removed from the accessibility tree.

props.name: orientation
props.description:
Orientation of the component.

Either `vertical` or `horizontal`. Defaults to `horizontal`.
